games.title: Moto X3M

The controls are simple ‚Äì use the keyboard arrow keys to control the acceleration and deceleration, and also your tilt. Ride through each course and try to land your jumps perfectly ‚Äì if you angle your bike incorrectly you risk tipping your bike over! 
Each level features different obstacles and objects for you to traverse ‚Äì you will find this game both fun and challenging! This is off-road biking to the max and for any motorbike fan, this game will provide a huge amount of enjoyment!

The world of Craftsman Land is constantly growing with new places, tasks, and adventures waiting to be discovered
games.howToPlayText:
In Craftsman Land, playing is simple and intuitive. On mobile devices you tap the screen, while on PC you use the mouse. Actions are performed automatically ‚Äì all you need are the required items and resources. With just a click, you can trigger different activities such as building houses, crafting tools, or producing goods.

Complete quests given by townsfolk to earn rewards and progress in the story. When you run out of quests, head to the crossroads where the bulletin board offers an endless supply of new tasks.

Explore the map to visit different shops:

Building materials store ‚Äì get everything you need for construction.

Tool shop ‚Äì find useful equipment for your farm.

Gardening store ‚Äì buy seeds and expand your fields.

Not everything has to be bought! Many materials can be produced by yourself. Chop wood, fire clay into bricks at the campfire, and create other essential resources to use in crafting and construction.

Grow crops, raise animals, trade, and craft your way to success while helping the entire town thrive!

Tiles keep coming from the top and move down. Your job is to make sure none of the tiles touch the bottom border. If they do, oops, the level is over and you have to start again!
